branchCategory.name: IS3000, Mechanical Pressure Switch, AC/DC
branchCategory.description: <p>IS3000 is a mechanical pressure switch for applications where an electronic switch is unsuitable, or when it is desirable to trigger an electrical device when the set point is reached.  This mechanical switch offers excellent hysteresis and repeatability.  The circuit can be wired normally open or closed, with either AC or DC voltage and an optional micro load amperage.  Optional indicator lights are also available.  Any non-corrosive, non-flammable gas can be monitored.  IP40 enclosure rating.</p>
